field.name: description
field.value:
I've had a go at porting ActiveWriter to 2008.
After first trying the "upgrade" method without much success, I then generated completely new projects and ported the files over.
Things mostly work, though I do know i've managed to break the "right-click on the model designer" functionality.
I renamed things a bit, so it should be possible to install this alongside the 2005 version. I'm not sure whether you could have the same version do 2005 and 2008, so I thought this would be easier in the first instance.
The code probably includes a few of my extra patches - it works for me, other people's mileage may vary :-)
-dave
